scripts.start: webpack serve --port 3000 --mode development --open --hot --env companyId=61f713aee1822f4d387ae7f6 --env mainColor=#020358 --env animation=yes --env secondaryColor=#35AFE4 --env name='MediQo' --env description='Asistente Virtual' --env avatar=https://rest-ailalia.ngrok.io/rest/v1/api/webchat/avatar?avatar=Robot_1 --env socketUrl=https://ws-ailalia.ngrok.io --env restUrl=https://rest-ailalia.ngrok.io/rest/v1/api --env greeting=Hola!
